ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean to tell you other wise... and i wish it was ture.. belive me i wish it was ture .. i have an archery skill of 172. an fletching of 182... i depend
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mean to tell you other wise... and i wish it was ture.. belive me i
wish it was ture .. i have an archery skill of 172. an fletching of 182... i
depend on my bow alot when kiteing SG and HG and cyclops.. but i have never
herd or this and seen this in action... there is no npc that gives this
skill... and i don't know about the lark tiwitter bow .. but that bow is
commen enoght that if it were ture i would have herd about it by now.

take care
karvar
----- Original Message -----
From: Montu Dhillon <montu_dhillon@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 10:46 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] Split shot
